vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξυπν-ίζω,
(ὕπνος) awaken from sleep, οἱ κόρεις εὐχρήστως -ίζουσιν ἡμᾶς [NT+3rd c.BC+]:—passive, wake up, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to wake up, arouseawake
to awake, arouse, from sleep, Jn. 11:11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 叫醒，使人從睡夢中醒來 (約 11:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 叫醒，使人从睡梦中醒来 (约 11:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đánh thức; tỉnh ngủ. Xem G1853
